subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Jesper Parnevik followed his career-best opening round of 61 with a five-under-par 65 yesterday to take a four-stroke lead midway through the Texas Open in San Antonio.Parnevik’s 14-under 126 is the lowest 36-hole score on the PGA Tour this year and one stroke off the record held by Tiger Woods, Mark Calcavecchia, Tom Lehman and Corey Pavin.Four Swedes were atop the leader board. Mathias Gronberg was second, at 10 under, after a 65. Fredrik Jacobson (65) and Richard S. Johnson (66) were at nine under.
